snippet.title: Return to Melanat - Sword of Moonlight Game Trailer
snippet.description:
Return to Melanat is a King's Field fan game that attempts to recreate the environments of King's Field 2 in a whole new light, and while delivering an entirely new story. Like all King's Field games, its gameplay centers around exploration, methodical combat, and light puzzle solving. More info and a download link can be found here: http://gamejolt.com/games/rpg/return-to-melanat/37581/

The Sword of Moonlight editor is a game maker software released by From Software in 2000 for making King's Field like games. It was originally only available in Japan, but was later translated to English by Weisswolf. You can visit the Sword of Moonlight website here to download the software and its English patch (also check out the forums): http://www.swordofmoonlight.com
